channel.title: Artsy Engineering Radio

item.title: 0: Introducing Artsy Engineering Radio
item.description: Jon Allured, Matt Dole, and Steve Hicks introduce you to Artsy Engineering Radio and help you understand why you need another podcast in your life.
item.itunes:author: Jon Allured, Matt Dole, & Steve Hicks
item.itunes:summary: Jon Allured, Matt Dole, and Steve Hicks introduce you to Artsy Engineering Radio and help you understand why you need another podcast in your life.
item.itunes:keywords: engineering, software engineering, software development, open source

item.title: 1: How To Have Good Meetings
item.description: Ash Furrow talks with Steve Hicks about facilitating meaningful and inclusive team meetings, and how meetings are part of building teams, trust, and systems.
item.itunes:author: Ash Furrow & Steve Hicks
item.itunes:summary: Ash Furrow talks with Steve Hicks about facilitating meaningful and inclusive team meetings, and how meetings are part of building teams, trust, and systems.
item.itunes:keywords: engineering, software engineering, software development, open source
